function: Threat detection system for authentic self-concept
authentic_output: Information for maintaining proper boundaries and protecting authenticity
corrupted_output: Attempts to impose personal boundaries or patterns on others if unresolved or misprojected
information_provided: Signals that something is threatening core identity, values, or way of being; indicates required boundary recalibration

response_protocol.detect: Identify violation of authenticity or identity coherence
response_protocol.assess: Determine severity, source, and potential impact of the threat
response_protocol.respond: Reinforce boundaries, communicate clearly, or redirect energy constructively
response_protocol.release: Allow energy to decay once threat is neutralized, misattribution clarified, or integration through reflection occurs
